channel.title: Elite marines
channel.description: I would like for you guys to add elite marines with an ehanced AI and sharpshooting skills with special uniforms. They would be very rarely encountered of course being like mini-boss battles throughout the game.

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: El_Chubba_Chubba
item.description:
Skaevola:

Either that, or you end up like Eric Fong… bad grammar and a hairless sack.

…Or you’ll become a furry. Raminator can do amazing things to the brain.

HEHE…sack

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Skaevola
item.description:
Eric Fong:

It is okay for some guy that are not immune to Raminator, after few time, you will be immune to Raminator.:retard:

Either that, or you end up like Eric Fong… bad grammar and a hairless sack.

…Or you’ll become a furry. Raminator can do amazing things to the brain.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: The_Javid
item.description:
I like to think they are a mercenary group employed by who ever owns the Black Mesa Research Facility to clean up messes just like a resonance cascade. This way none of their equipment or tactics need to be up to military standards and [sarcasm] I won’t have to bitch and complain like the “military nut” that I am.[/sarcasm]

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
darkone:

who cares what you call them as long as you get to shoot them.
i jsut call them the spawn name Hgrunts.

also raminator sort of scares me now. in other words i haven’t had any sleep in 2 days am starting to hallucinate and i swear her/his/its image’s eyes started to glow red.

It is okay for some guy that are not immune to Raminator, after few time, you will be immune to Raminator.:retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Burbinator:

The real question is, who cares? They’re bad-ass soldiers out to kill you. That should be enough.

Military nuts, who get their panties in a knot because the HECU aren’t accurate enough compared to real world marines. They don’t have to be, because they aren’t. It avoids a lot of arguments.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Sampdel
item.description:
Im thinking the same thing as Faleiro,

If the others follow the leader of the squad if you killed the squad leader will the others be less coordinated without him?

I am loving the Devs even more now.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
I don’t know if there is any actual official info, But who the hell else would they be.
I assume Valve told Gearbox they were marines when they were developing Opfor.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

The HECU are a highly trained MARSOC detachment specializing in Close Combat and Unconventional Warfare. In other words, they are Elite Marines.

Locate one bit of OFFICAL information indicating the HECU are supposed to have any ties to marines.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
^ Truth.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Cris90
item.description:
Lord Grievous:

they don’t seem like the kind to ambush you or even communicate amongst themselves.

So, why do I keep getting ambushed in Ravenholm? :fffuuu:

And we don’t (or at least I don’t) know if they use their sounds to communicate somehow.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Raminator:

Any NPC in a squad (e.g. fireteams of human grunts, packs of houndeyes, mobs of zombies) will alert his squadmates to your presence if he sees you. We can use this to do things like have snipers spotting for ambush teams of grunts, have one houndeye keeping watch while the others sleep, or have zombies that are playing dead bring others in to surround you.

That’s a great addition to the AI routines, but I don’t think that the zombies should behave like a squad, they don’t seem like the kind to ambush you or even communicate amongst themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
The HECU are a highly trained MARSOC detachment specializing in Close Combat and Unconventional Warfare. In other words, they are Elite Marines.

Read full topic

Zombies playing dead? I’ll have to use the double tap method. (zombie land)

Now it become new rule of zombie survive, that movie is awesome.

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Vancore:

If your lucky maybe you’ll get a quip like “Freeman just offed the Sarge, take him down”… then all the marines become enraged… :3

I’m almost certain it’s wrong that I read that as ‘then all the marines become engorged’!

Read full topic

item.title: Elite marines
item.dc:creator: Vancore
item.description:
Faleiro:

uh, nice.

Do the human squads strategies and capabilities get worse when their leaders die? Does it couse any sort of confusion?

If your lucky maybe you’ll get a quip like “Freeman just offed the Sarge, take him down”… then all the marines become enraged… :3

Read full topic
